name: Re-Take
description:
Pre-alpha of my latest game project.

Destroy buildings and then construct as many of your own habitat. the player with most habitats builded will win.

CONTROLS:

Gamepad

-Spawn: start

-Move: analog stick

-Destroy: X

-Build: Y

Keyboard

-Spawn: space

-Move: AWSD

-Destroy: X

-Build: Y
